event.description: Anderson Hernandez strikes out swinging.
Nick Johnson grounds out, second baseman Felipe Lopez to first baseman Mark Reynolds.
Ryan Zimmerman singles on a ground ball to center fielder Chris Young, deflected by pitcher Max Scherzer.
Adam Dunn singles on a soft line drive to right fielder Justin Upton. Ryan Zimmerman to 3rd.
Josh Willingham strikes out swinging.
Willie Harris strikes out swinging.
Alex Cintron walks.
Wil Nieves singles on a line drive to right fielder Justin Upton. Alex Cintron to 2nd.
Scott Olsen ground bunts into a force out, pitcher Max Scherzer to third baseman Ryan Roberts. Alex Cintron out at 3rd. Wil Nieves to 2nd. Scott Olsen to 1st.
Anderson Hernandez flies out to left fielder Eric Byrnes.
Nick Johnson grounds out, first baseman Mark Reynolds to pitcher Max Scherzer.
Ryan Zimmerman strikes out swinging.

Scott Olsen walks.

Pitching Change: Chad Qualls replaces Ramon Pena, batting 7th, replacing third baseman Ryan Roberts.
